author: benjaminchodroff
content: If you have an Ethereum validator, and have not stored your validator seed phrase securely offline, we would encourage you to consider using CLWP to set your withdrawal address. We will broadcast these submissions at the Capella hard fork. This may help you win against an attacker. We are accepting submissions until 2/28. Over 750 validators have used CLWP - happy to help anyone who has questions. We would greatly appreciate any node operators to load the CLWP submissions on their nodes to help protect others. https://github.com/benjaminchodroff/ConsensusLayerWithdrawalProtection
